Summary: It came flew over at high speed,no sound,orange lights then the lights went out. All that they could see was a black circle
divs: Sighting DetailsThe sighting of the ufo was not by me,but by my wife and my two children.It was Thursday night and fireworks were starting to go off around the area,the sky was clear in some parts but the rest of it was grey and overcast.This time of night i'm still at work,but having a 10 min break.This is when my wife phones me up and starts to tell me about what they saw.1st It came and flew over at a high speed,no sound,orange lights then it disappeared.2nd They think it was the same one,but the lights went out and there was a black silhouette of a circle moving off in the same direction,not as fast as the one before and finally disappearing.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Southampton
There were no other sightings in Southampton on or around October 6th 2008
